meanings.sent1: The pinafored girl looked adorable in her dress.
meanings.sent2: She always felt comfortable when pinafored in her favorite outfit.
meanings.sent3: The pinafored cat tried to sneak a treat from the table.
meanings.sent4: The garden was pinafored in a blanket of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The pinafored doll stood out among the other toys.

meanings.definition: Covered or protected by a pinafore.
meanings.sent1: The pinafored dishes were safe from any spills.
meanings.sent2: The picnic basket was pinafored to keep the food fresh.
meanings.sent3: The pinafored book was shielded from the rain.
meanings.sent4: The tree was pinafored by the lush branches above.
meanings.sent5: The little bird nested in the pinafored branches of the tree.
